body.content:
With a warm heart I offer my friendship and hope this letter meets you in
good time. I write from a sorrowful and emotional Laddered heart and I need
a good spirited person to carry out my last wish. I promise you will not
regret this day as long as your heart is pure and sincere.

 My Husband Late Dr Han Cha Chi, worked with American Embassy Ankara Turkey
for nine years before he died in a fatal motor accident in 2009. Since his
death I decided not to remarry.

 I sold all my inherited belongings and deposited the sum of 3.2Million
Three Million two hundred thousand U.S.Dollars.

 I have decided not to have anything to do with my late Husband siblings
due to the way and manner they treated me in the past.  I was a successful
retired senior nurse,but did not have any child. I am presently in a London
hospital here receiving treatment for Cancer

I have since lost my ability to talk and my doctors have told me that I
have only a few months to live. My wish is for you to donate 70% of this
money invested/donated to any organization/business of your choice and
distribute to charity organizations, e.g. motherless babies
homes,orphanages, while 30% will be yours as compensation for all your
efforts and money that will be invested in this project during the course
of the release into your account from where the fund is presently deposited
in a bank in Turkey.

I seek your partnership,with hope that you will not let me down as we
proceed in actualizing this project if you indicate your willingness in
working with me.I will give you further details immediately I receive your
urgent reply on how we will go about the whole fund release process and
further release of this fund into your nominated bank account.

Can I trust you with this funds? Note that all the documents that cover
this money will be provided/secured in your favour as we commence the
release process.

Ponder over my proposal and get back to me so that we can swing into action
and I seek your confidence/commitment in this transaction.

I will wait to receive your urgent response.

Yours sincerely,
 Mrs Chung Cha Chi,


On Mon, 26 Jul 2021 at 16:29, <johnny@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> John
>
>

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
